onBoarding: To get started you will first need to add words to your spelling list. To do this, say, add word.
whatDo: What would you like to do?

errors.spellTestInProgress: Your spelling test is in progress to complete this action you will first need to end your spelling test. To do this, say, end spelling test.
errors.actions: I am unable to complete this action.
errors.sorry: Sorry about that. Please try again.

addWord: Please spell the word you would like to add to your spelling list.
duplicateEntry: %s, is already on your spelling list.
deleteWord: Please spell the word you would like to delete from your spelling list.
cannotDeleteWord: %s, is not in your spelling list.
readWords: You have <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as> word%s in your spelling list. They are, <break time="0.8s"/>
spellingWord: %s is spelt, <say-as interpret-as="spell-out">%s</say-as>, now you spell it.

help.spelltest: At any time you can say, repeat word, spell word, or exit spelling test.
help.basic: You can start a spelling test, add word, remove word, new spelling list or say help. What would you like?

testSummary: End of spelling test. You scored <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as> out of <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as>.
